pages.text: You've come this far and you still have to deal with the fact that your common tools like [#](bb00bb)Flint and Steel$() keep breaking once you use it too many times. And you had more than enough equipment, which was previously too fragile to use for long.\With your full armada of nearly-indestructible items now, though? No problem.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Makes a tool fully unbreakable, not taking damage anymore.\\Max Level: 1\Applicable to all tools.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a [#](bb00bb)common Book[#]() with Indestructible by surrounding your [Enchanter](book://enchanting/enchanter) with [Pigment](book://general/pigment) and the other required materials.
